name: Jimbu Thakali Thali
description: Locally grown rice with dal imported from lower regions to the south ,vegetables & ghee, along with chicken, mutton or fish

name: Dhido Thali
description: Dish prepared by gradually adding flour to boiling water while stirring served with different vegetables and chicken or goat curry.

name: Royal Briyani
description: Mixed rice dish made with Indian spices, rice and meat.

name: Tandoori duo Chicken n Lamb
description: Fusion of tandoori specialties: chicken tikka, lamb tikka, chicken seekh kabob, lamb seekh kabob, tandoori chicken
